column1: On February 18, 2007, John McCain stated, I do not support Roe versus Wade. It should be overturned."[167] McCain believes that Roe v. Wade should be overturned and that the issue of abortion should be returned to the states."

Nader is opposed to legal restrictions on abortion, I don't think government has the proper role in forcing a woman to have a child or forcing a woman not to have a child... This is something that should be privately decided with the family
